title: Fear - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/20/18
itunes:title: Fear - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/20/18
description:
Guest host Dave Schrader and sociologist Dr. Margee Kerr discuss her research into fear, and why this powerful emotion is a key for human survival in dangerous situations.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
